oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ransom Temple Cumberland Presbyterian, 2001 May
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Ransom Temple Cumberland Presbyterian Church located at 2210 Buchanan Street in Nashville, Tennessee. This congregation was formed in 1889. The church building was finished in 1968 and remodeled in 1975. The foundation is brick. The exterior walls are brick with stone at some of the corners. The roof is gabled and hipped and composed of tar shingles. The windows are orange frosted glass. The doors are metal and glass. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ransom Temple Cumberland Presbyterian Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
